title: Biomedical engineering's Anirban Sen Gupta cited for research on relationship between COVID-19 vaccines, menstrual cycle timing
author: Kmh
description: One side effect of the COVID-19 vaccine could be a heavier period The Verge: Anirban Sen Gupta, biomedical engineering professor, was cited for new research into a potential relationship between COVID-19 vaccines and the timing of a person's menstrual cycle.
cleaned_text: vaccine could be a heavier period](https://www.theverge.com/2021/4/9/22374523/covid-vaccine-period-heavy-survey) The Verge: Anirban Sen Gupta, biomedical engineering professor, was cited for new research into a potential relationship between COVID-19 vaccines and the timing of a person's menstrual cycle.
